summary: AN ORDINANCE approving and confirming the plat of "Holly Park Subdivision No. 2." a replat of a portion of Section 27, Township 24 North, Range 4 East, W.M., authorizing the Mayor or his designee to execute the dedication on the face of the plat, and superseding the bond requirement of SMC 23.22070C (Subdivision Application No. 9900050).
committee: Housing, Human Services and Civil Rights
